job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: pWant to help everyday Americans invest and build wealth Financial inequality is increasing and too many people are getting left behind At Stash we are passionate about democratizing wealth creation through education advice and products that help customers achieve greater financial freedomppbrppStash is seeking Principal Machine Learning Engineers to join our engineering teamnbspnbspppThis role focuses on shipping MLdriven features that enhance the steady building of wealth and spend management for millions of our customersnbspnbspppAs a senior technical leader you will work across many functions in the company from Design Modeling Engineering Growth Support and Fraud Prevention to enable sophisticated AI solutions at scalenbspWe are looking for a technical leader with motivation to build beautiful intuitive products with empathy for our customersnbspThis is a careerdefining opportunity where you can help bring to market new categories of products including crypto productsnbspnbspppbrppstrongYou willstrongpulliPlay a technical leadership role influencing collaborating and contributing to MLdriven product features that seamlessly help improve the customers financial conditionliliHelp lead the companys machine learning technical direction to pursue opportunities that make the larger organization more efficientliliDevelop entity graphs feature stores model training and model serving capabilities in a faulttolerant distributed computing environmentliliCollaborate with Data Scientists in building highly scalable ML models for NLP Fraud Prevention Growth Recommenders Personalization and other use casesliliUnderstand industry and companywide trends to help develop new technologiesliulpbrppstrongQualificationsstrongpulli8 years of experience in one or more of the following areasnbspstatistical classifiers to deep learning reinforcement learning NLP personalized AI agents or recommenderslili12 years of experience in programming languages Python C Java or ScalanbspliliProven track record of planning multiyear technical roadmap where shortterm releases ladder into the longterm visionliliExperience communicating and working across functions to drive solutionsliliExperience in mentoringinfluencing senior engineers across organizationsliliEagerness to share your own ideas and openness to those of othersliliExperience with cloud computing platforms such as AWS Google Cloud or AzureliulpbrppAt Stash it is our mission to help everyday Americans invest and build wealth That includes people of all racesnbspgenders and abilities so it is important to us to acknowledge and address the issues of inequality in financial services head onnbspppbrppDiversity and inclusion are essential to living our values promoting innovation and building the best products Our success is directly related to our employees and we believe that our team should reflect the diversity of the customers that we servenbspAs an Equal Opportunity Employer Stash is committed to building an inclusive environment for people of all backgroundsppIf you require any reasonable accommodations to make your application
